protocol.name: P-TABM-103
protocol.text: RNA was extracted from the bulked plants using TRIzol as per the manufacturer’s protocol (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA), followed by purification on RNeasy columns (Qiagen, Valencia, CA, USA).

protocol.name: P-TABM-hans15
text: Seeds of Arabidopsis thaliana accessions Bay-0 and Sha were obtained from ABRC through TAIR (www.arabidopsis.org).  Bay-0 and Sha plants grown on three separate dates in a growth chamber under short day conditions (8 h light at 100Ð120 ?Ei, 20¡C day/ 20¡C night) to maintain plants in the vegetative phase. At 6 wk these plants were sprayed to run-off with 0.02% Silwet L77, a surfactant (Lehle Seeds;
). All rosette leaves of three plants per genotype-time point combination were bulk harvested 4, 28, or 52 h post-treatment and quick-frozen in liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-TABM-hans16
protocol.text: cDNA and labeled cRNA were prepared according to the manufacturer’s guidelines in the GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual 701021 rev1 (Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA, USA).  cDNA synthesis was performed with enzymes purchased from Invitrogen, and biotin labeling was conducted using an ENZO IVT labeling kit as per the GeneChip manufacturer's protocols.
